statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{12.26}; top has length \displaystyle{12.83}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{8.49} and \displaystyle{8.65}. The height is \displaystyle{8.20}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{12.83}+{8.65}+{12.26}+{8.49}={42.23}.
